comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
That has got to join up with, if not an exact panorama - from the Hill & Clark warehouse -

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/8953022765/]

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
And I reckon she is the ORIENT even more now! The bridge / wheelhouse looks just like -

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/8725149344/]

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
And I am 90% sure that lifebelt says "ORIENT GLASGOW" (see note).

Apologies - getting too EXCITED.  It is great to see all the detail of this wonderful ship so close up - the sailors in the bosun's chairs, the fellow scaring seagulls, etc, etc !!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Glad you enjoyed! The fuller picture of Circular Quay is coming together. We agree that this is almost certainly ORIENT.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
